7cc3337c-3b6b-4a07-9bbc-b73b4c7a61c1.name: VM Datastore Local
7cc3337c-3b6b-4a07-9bbc-b73b4c7a61c1.formula: count(${adaptertype=VMWARE, objecttype=Datastore, metric=summary|isLocal, depth=1, where=($value equals 'true')}) > 0 ? 1 : 0
7cc3337c-3b6b-4a07-9bbc-b73b4c7a61c1.description: VM Datastore Local: 1 if VM is on a local Datastore, 0 if not
